column4: hey. i want to add universe/multiverse repositories for feisty fawn 7.04, but i can only find "HowTos" for dapper and egdy. (pretty new to ubuntu, 'xcuseme)
anyone care to lend a hend?
if I were new to linux/ubuntu I'd start with edgy.. there's a lot more documentation on edgy
but you can ask in #ubuntu+1 .That channel is dedicated to feisty suport
